org.hps.analysis.ecal

Class MassCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.analysis.ecal.MassCalculator

  • public class MassCalculator
extends Object
    This code contains all of the calculations, as found in the 2015 data, for combining the Ecal energy and SVT momentum.

      • combinedMass

        public static double combinedMass(Cluster clusterA,
                                  Cluster clusterB,
                                  ReconstructedParticle v0,
                                  int runNumber)
        This takes in the clusters of two particles and the associated vertex and calculates the invariant mass. The cluster order must match the track order as listed in the vertex.
        Returns:
        weighted invariant mass (GeV)

      • combinedMass

        public static double combinedMass(Track trackA,
                                  Cluster clusterB,
                                  ReconstructedParticle v0,
                                  int runNumber)
        This takes in the clusters of two particles and the associated vertex and calculates the invariant mass. The cluster order must match the track order as listed in the vertex. Use if electron has no cluster
        Returns:
        weighted invariant mass (GeV)
